mapper.select: select /* UsrDao.getUsr */ usr_sq as usr_sq /* numeric-사용자_순번 */ , usr_id as usr_id /* varchar-사용자_ID */ , enc_usr_pwd as enc_usr_pwd /* varchar-암호화_사용자_비밀번호 */ , usr_cls_cd as usr_cls_cd /* varchar-사용자_구분_코드 */ , pwd_chg_dt as pwd_chg_dt /* varchar-비밀번호_변경_일자 */ , pwd_expr_dt as pwd_expr_dt /* varchar-비밀번호_만료_일자 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp-등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp-수정_일시 */ from usr /* 사용자 */ where 1=1 and usr_id = #{usr_id} /* varchar-사용자_ID */

select /* UsrDao.getUsrInfo */ usr_sq as usr_sq /* numeric-사용자_순번 */ , usr_nm as usr_nm /* varchar-사용자_이름 */ , enc_usr_phn_no as enc_usr_phn_no /* varchar-암호화_사용자_전화_번호 */ , enc_usr_email as enc_usr_email /* varchar-암호화_사용자_이메일 */ , reg_dt as reg_dt /* timestamp-등록_일시 */ , chg_dt as chg_dt /* timestamp-수정_일시 */ from usr_info /* 사용자_정보 */ where 1=1 and usr_sq = cast(#{usr_sq} as numeric)
